name: Wizards Of Alamar
description:
Role playing wizardry at its finest! 

This fast-paced action-packed game will have you begging for more. Collect artifacts and explore quests that not only expands, but taxes your magical prowess. Unlock a multitude of puzzles and fight through the never ending onslaught of enemies as you search for the Lost Keys of Alamar. Courage, wisdom and sheer grit is what you need to prevail.  Do you have what it takes to defeat your enemies and collect the keys before Van Em-Minroe?

Updates and  Interactions...

We are going to be approaching this a little differently.  For those who join us on Patreon there will be a lot of behind the scenes stuff and some really neat in game bonuses.  Not only added insight to the creation of the game, but the ability to help drive the content of future quests. For both Patreon and Itch users  we will be updating the game on a weekly basis. Each update will consist of added content, better animations and a new Quest and a host of  other thing we will be doing throughout the next few years. Yeah you heard me right... this project will be expanding and evolving over the next few years. AND ITS GONNA BE FUN! 

JOIN US!
